name: Foremedia Ads Inserter
author: Foremedia

sections.description:
This plugin helps you to integrate Foremedia Ads into your WordPress site.
This plugin requires you to get your unique token from platform.foremedia.net in order to do so please follow these simple steps:

1. Goto https://platform.foremedia.net/login and login to your account
2. Click on your name on top right corner and select settings
3. If you have multiple websites in your account, please click on the domain name (on the bottom on your name in top right corner) and select the domain name this plugin is going to install.
4. On this page you will see a "Get Token" button. (If creating it for the first time)
5. You will be provided with a unique token. copy the token.
6. Go to wordpress admin and select "ForeMedia Ads" section on the left.
7. You will be asked for the API token got from Foremedia platform. Paste the code and click authorize.
8. If the code is not authorized please confim that you copied the correct token for your correct domain on step 3.

This token will be used for accessing all the features to this plugin. This token is used to authorized the domain ownership for us without manual verification.
Also this token will be used to identify the exact id domain for which user is asking for the analytics code and the ads.txt as different websites has differrnt codes.
Besides this token is used to sync the settings bettween the wordpress and the platform. User can update ForeMedia domain settings via wordpress admin panel.

Basically this plugin is made for making the life esalier for our publisher and control everything from wordpress admin panel without visiting the ForeMedia platform.

Foremedia Platform link https://foremedia.net/
Link to our privacy poilcy https://foremedia.net/privacy-policy/
Link to our terms of service https://foremedia.net/publisher-terms-of-service/
sections.installation:
Requirements

*PHP 7.2 or higher
*WordPress v1.2.x or higher

Installation Process

*Log into the WordPress admin for your site.
*Go to ‘Plugins’ -> ‘Add New’
*Search for Foremedia. Once found click on ‘Install Now’
*Select ‘Activate Plugin’ from the download page or go to ‘Plugins’ -> ‘Installed Plugins’ -> ‘Activate Plugin’

Connection and Approval process

*Select ‘Settings -> which will navigate to Foremedia’s setting page. Or click on the left rail menu item ‘Foremedia Ads’
*ForeMedia will set up your account and send you the following required information â€“ ‘Token ID’
*Enter the ‘Token ID’ received from ForeMedia in your Foremedia account
*By Navigating to the right corner -> click on your profile icon-> Settings
*Check the boxes of the relevant settings you would like to be activated
*Click ‘Apply To Site’
*Go take a look at your site, the widget is live and your site is now waiting for approval!

All other Banners

*Go to the Business Manager section in Foremedia Dashboard
*Choose the ad you want to display
*Copy the code->implement code the ad placement you want to show the ad
*Click on ‘Save’
*Go take a look at your site, the ad is live!
